name: Brooks Pick-Up Tank - Women's
description:
Pick up the pace without overheating. The moisture-managing DryLayer fabric wicks away your hard-earned sweat to keep you dry and focused. The 4-way stretch allows you to move freely from run to yoga to crossfit and back.Moisture-wicking polyester and spandex dries quickly so you stay dry and comfortable.Racerback and 4-way stretch for unrestricted movement.Fitted design is great as a baselayer on cooler days.

        Sustainability
